ProjectTitle: What can olfactory dysfunction in COVID-19 tell us about the mysteries of the sense of smell?
InitialFeedbackHistory:
08/07/2022
FWO expects more information than what you describe in a data management plan. You have just provided the data management information that is asked for in the proposal. At this stage of the research more information is needed. You can use DMPonline KU Leuven, selecting the FWO template, or use a Word template. Info and template are here: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/dmp
